humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates a diagnosis of 'pT1cN1aL1V0R0' which corresponds to the TNM staging system for cancer. In this case, 'N1' indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. This is based on Rule 12, which states that N1 corresponds to metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. The 'N1a' in the report supports this, indicating that there is metastasis in a single axillary lymph node.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pT1cN1aL1V0R0' classification in the report indicates that the tumor size is T1c (1.9 cm), and there is lymph node involvement (N1). Specifically, N1a suggests that there is metastasis in 1-3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.
